resources.string:
Information Sessions Join us at the information sessions, and find out if the Master of Science in Computer Science Programme is the right fit for your career goals. Information Sessions include a programme overview and Q＆A, plus the opportunity to talk informally with Programme Director and staff. Potential applicants are welcome.
Information sessions will be organized in Hong Kong and Mainland China. Details of these information sessions will be announced on our website and/or advertised online and in major local newspapers.
Details of the information session:
Date Time Venue location_on 04 December 2018 (Tuesday) 6:30-8:00pm MSc(CompSc) and MSc(ECom＆IComp) Information Session Theatre A, G/F Chow Yei Ching Building The University of Hong Kong, Pokfulam Road edit
